infos.title: Berserker Assassin
infos.characteristics: [Shadow Stealth] is a special state that gives 100% dodge rate to all attacks up to 100 times, after which the skill is dispelled for a set amount of time. Heroes with high hit-rate and atk spd are advantageous in this stage.

1.name: Shadow Slash
1.description: Moves swiftly, dealing P.DMG to 5 random enemies and inflict Bleeding. Also inflict a Recovery Reduction status that cannot be dispelled for the rest of the battle.

2.name: Berserk Burst
2.description: Enter a Berserker Rage, increasing ATK, Crit Chance and ATK Spd greatly for 10 sec.

3.name: No Mercy
3.description: Jump up, and upon landing, slash at the enemy with the lowest HP, dealing immense P.DMG.

4.name: Shadow Stealth
4.description: Dodge 100 attacks every 40 seconds. After dodging 100 attacks, fall into a stun state.

5.name: Purify
5.description: Every 30 sec, remove all negative effects and increase ATK SPD.
